## TryCpScenario.cleanUp() method

Shut down and delete all conductors in the scenario, and stop the TryCP server.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cleanUp(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
